Release.Notes: New formats: - new Csystem archives formats - QLIE FilePackVer3.1 - Kaguya 'UF01' archives - Yatagarasu PKG archives - RHA audio files - ADPS audio files - support new EAGLS (pak+idx) archives - Artemis 'pf2' archives - Crowd CRZ images - MicroVision ARC1 archives, GPC images and IKM audio - more KiriKiri and Csystem encryption schemes
